title: Leavebuster problems
body: I crash because of the game needs to repair something so i can play, i did nothing wrong, then they give me a leavebuster, even though i left because the game forced me, its getting really annoying and this isnt the first time

replies.body: Even though you didn't mean to leave, the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system will treat it equally because it still causes others a negative experience.  Let me know if you need any help with the issue you're having or any errors, so we can prevent this from happening again!
The same thing just happened for me and now I have a leaver buster. is there anything you can do to correct the leaver buster
